name: OCKAnyEvent
desc: An object that represents a single occasion on which a task is scheduled to occur.

items.name: init(task: OCKAnyTask, outcome: OCKAnyOutcome?, scheduleEvent: OCKScheduleEvent)
items.desc: Creates an event with a task, optional outcome, and schedule event.

items.name: let task: OCKAnyTask
items.desc: The task to which the event belongs.

items.name: let scheduleEvent: OCKScheduleEvent
items.desc: The schedule event for this specific task occurrence.
